accountId.title: Account Id
accountId.description: The Account Id that owns the storefront. Required for security validation.

menuId.title: Menu Id
menuId.description: The Menu__c record Id to retrieve items for. If provided, storefrontId is ignored.

storefrontId.title: Storefront Id
storefrontId.description: The Storefront__c record Id to retrieve all menu items for (across all menus). Used only if menuId is not provided.
